title: Question about Summoner Name refresh
body:
I've got 1 question about Summoner Name changes:

If someone changes his name to someone else, will it become avaible for everyone instantly or do you have to wait ~2 years like if he was inactive

Thank you for the replies :)

replies.body: You should be able to pick up a summoner name if the previous owner changed it.  The [name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-) would only impact inactive accounts.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Can confirm. One of my friends changed names, and another instantly took his old name and trolled our other friends with it in our club chat. It confused people a good bit untill (person 2) changed theirs back.
